page.title: 12Charities
page.content: a Shield for dominoes.Two Guide Dogs have been bought called Pippa and Lisa.A local farmer started a small country show for this fund.It has now become an annual show,held in the Black Horse yard each September. There is a lady who helps to raise money for Christian Aid.The money collected goes to Africa and Bangladesh .It is used to dig wells, build houses,hospitals and schools. The people are taught to use small ploughs and grow their own crops. The money, when collected is sent to London.The lady also helps to raise money for the Red Cross and Poppy Day.The money for Red Cross goes to Headquarters in London. The Poppy Day money goes to the British Legion in London.Eight adults and three children help the lady. The
